alert.note: Alert for Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 24 at 9:44PM PST until January 26 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO 2 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast and Malibu Coast. * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to 2 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
